title: september 1: a sad farewell to passenger pigeons
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the shockingly swift extinction of passenger pigeons, formerly one of the world’s largest species of bird. She also discusses how it spawned the earliest conservation movements, and what we can do today to protect endangered species. After, Maia revisits the grand opening of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
